oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William Waters to Sir Thomas Hardy — Birthday Postcard
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: William Waters
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Printed and manuscript postcard; colour lithograph with ink inscription
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Birthday postcard from William Waters, London, to Sir Thomas Hardy, expressing good wishes and admiration from a young reader of his works.
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:provenance: Held by Dorset History Centre / Dorset Museum.
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:rights: Rights status uncertain; consult holding repository.
